title: Witherbloom Academy (bi-weekly narrative poetry with Ink) ep: 1
post: <center><b>Sweet Forsaken Remedy <br> Mario and Amity </b></center><br><br> I can’t believe she got in this school <br><br><i>You know her grandfather is on the school board</i><br><br> Yeah, but still…. <br><br><i>They say she’s quite bright.. </i></center><br><br> I dont care what <u> they</u> say. She’s.. that is to say.. well- Witherbloom’s been an all-boys school for years. Don’t you think it’s  a bit distracting from our studies?<br><br><i> .. Do you think that?</i><br><br> No, i just figured the board might. <br><br><i>Her grandfather was the deciding vote..</i><br><br>Oh. <br><br><br> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br><br> <b><u>(AU):</u><i> Thank you for reading this post, i really appreciate it, new entries will continue to come  Sundays and Wednesdays. If you missed my last one, you can always check out my scratch studio  with a full library of all past entries { https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/33694307/ } or you can just check out the scratch project for this entry, which has footnotes and explanations for this entry, as well as its relations to past and future episodes { https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/881338954/ }. And as always, thank you for your time.  :pride::heart::trans:
